DOC.brief_summary: The encapsulation within CM may improve bioavailability ( BA ) vitamin D ( VD ) , even absence fat . As model investigator choose nonfat yoghurt . The investigator prepare yoghurts 4 milk : ( 1 ) Skimmilk enrich 50,000 IU/150gr VD encapsulate CM2 ; ( 2 ) 3 % fat milk wherein dose VD - dissolve milk fat homogenize skimmilk ; ( 3 ) 3 % fat milk wherein VD , dose , CM ; ( 4 ) Placebo : unenriched skimmilk . 120 healthy adult age 18-65 randomized 5 group receive 150 gr yoghurt . Blood drawn ingestion day 1,7,14 . 25 ( OH ) D det . CMIA . In vitro simulate digestion study . Expected result : The BA VD CM would lower fat
